Documentation.content: Types for the Parallel Block Basic Linear Algebra Sub-programs support WARNING: attributes marked with WARNING can not be changed without making corresponding changes to the C++ attributes.

Documentation.content: Module to calculate matrix dimensions and matrix partition dimensions from matrix cells.
Documentation.firstline: Module to calculate matrix dimensions and matrix partition dimensions from matrix cells

Documentation.content: Get a list of work-item ids from a matrix containing one or more work items
Documentation.firstline: Get a list of work-item ids from a matrix containing one or more work items

Definition.name: InsertCols

Documentation.return: matrix in Layout_Cell format with additional column(s)

param.name: cols_to_insert
param.desc: the number of columns to insert, default 1

param.name: insert_val
param.desc: the value for each cell of the new column(s), default 0

Documentation.content: Insert one or more columns of a fixed value into a matrix. Columns are inserted before the first original column. This attribute supports the myriad interface. Multiple independent matrixes can be represented by M.
Documentation.firstline: Insert one or more columns of a fixed value into a matrix

Signature.sign: DATASET(Layout_Cell) InsertCols(DATASET(Layout_Cell) M, UNSIGNED cols_to_insert=1, value_t insert_val=1)
Signature.name: InsertCols

Definition.Signature: DATASET(Layout_Cell) InsertCols(DATASET(Layout_Cell) M, UNSIGNED cols_to_insert=1, value_t insert_val=1)
